data: {"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ここでは","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"VSCode","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"(Visual Studio Code)でpythonを始める方法を説明します。","href":null}]}
{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"まずVSCodeを開いてください。","href":null}]}
{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"「フォルダを開く」をクリックします。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"するとエクスプローラー（ファイルやフォルダを管理できるところ）が開きます。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"エクスプローラー上で右クリックし、「新規作成」から「フォルダ」を選んでください。","href":null}]}
{"parent":[],"url":"/horizon-atlas/notion_data/eachPage/1ada501e-f337-814b-ac7d-cbd864901138/image/1dfa501e-f337-81f7-8d77-d170e1734597.png"}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"フォルダの名前を「python-basic」としてください。","href":null}]}

{"icon":{"type":"emoji","emoji":"⚠️"},"color":"yellow_background","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"操作しずらくなるので、フォルダの名前には空白（スペース）を含めないようにしましょう","href":null}]}
{"parent":[],"url":"/horizon-atlas/notion_data/eachPage/1ada501e-f337-814b-ac7d-cbd864901138/image/1dfa501e-f337-8154-86ca-e4deba8db917.png"}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"フォルダを作成したら、作成したフォルダをダブルクリックしてから、「フォルダの選択」をクリックしてください。","href":null}]}
{"parent":[],"url":"/horizon-atlas/notion_data/eachPage/1ada501e-f337-814b-ac7d-cbd864901138/image/1dfa501e-f337-8152-96a2-d865a2bbcc39.png"}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"これで、VSCodeでフォルダを開くことができました。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"次に、画面左にカーソルを移動させ、「+ボタン」をクリックしてファイルを作成します。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ファイルの名前は、「python-test.py」としましょう。","href":null}]}
